author: John Bowden
title: 44 Texas spring-breakers test positive for coronavirus
description: The number of confirmed cases of coronavirus in a group of Texas students who traveled to Mexico for spring break grew by more than 50 percent overnight.CNN reported Wednesday that 44 students in a group of about 7...
content:
The number of confirmed coronavirus cases in a group of University of Texas students who traveled to Mexico for spring break grew by more than 50 percent overnight.
CNN reported Wednesday that 44 students in a group of about 70 students who chartered a plane… [+1318 chars]
